item.description:
Herb is going to be leading a very meaningful workshop about addiction. Almost everyone has some sort of addictive tendency (such as to caffeine or being online). Here is a description of the workshop from Herb:

“Most people have addictive tendencies, whether to food, love, sex, romance, tv, computers, spending, shopping, compulsions, gambling, moneymaking, spending, etc. You'll explore yours, look at the underneath layers that motivate the addiction and ways to limit the addictive tendencies in healthier ways.”

The suggested minimum cost of attending the workshop is $15.00. A sliding scale of any amount is allowed if the cost would otherwise prevent you from coming. The traditional cost of this workshop has been $40.00 so if you can afford more than $15.00, it helps the presenter and those who pay less.

Refreshments will be served. We are also welcomed to bring and share our own food as long as there is not any meat in it.
item.name: Dealing with Addictive Tendencies
